name: The Legend of the Seven Doors - Alpha
name_original: The Legend of the Seven Doors - Alpha
description:
A prototype of my own GameBoy game! If you want to play it, you need a GameBoy or GameBoy Color emulator. If you play it on a GameBoy color you also have colors!

I don actually know what this game will be about, but we'll see :D

Controlls: The controlls of your Emulator

I made this Game with GB Studio. This is a free Software and you can create Gameboy Games with it!
